casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Terraine Sanchez BYERS No. 69A06-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 16, 2019 Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of NC. Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Byers, Terraine Sanchez.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 15th of January 2019 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of January 2019."
